first_time: ^Oh hello humble business man! What can I help you with?

s: ^Oh- hi! I don't know? I just opened a store near here.

services: ^I sell amazing pieces to improve business, I do basically do everything! I can reform builidings, put decorations, signs... So basically everthing a young businessman like you would need to improve your store.
^That would come in handy... definetely. What are your pricing systems?
^You will see my prices here in this list. My services are not free, of course.
^I have some excess of clothing that I could sell to afford this upgrades.
